params.pids: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pending: SUSHI reward for a given user.

params.to: Receiver of the tokens, first of his name, rightful heir to the lost tokens, reightful owner of the extra tokens, and ether, protector of mistaken transfers, mother of token reclaimers, the Khaleesi of the Great Token Sea, the Unburnt, the Breaker of blockchains.
params.token: Token to reclaim, use 0x00 for Ethereum

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

params._rewardPerSecond: The amount of Sushi to be distributed per second.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pool: Returns the pool that was updated.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

add(uint256,uint256).notice: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

massUpdatePools(uint256[]).notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

pendingToken(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending Token

poolLength().notice: Returns the number of MCV2 pools.

reclaimTokens(address,uint256,address).notice: Allows owner to reclaim/withdraw any tokens (including reward tokens) held by this contract

set(uint256,uint256).notice: Update the given pool's SUSHI allocation point and `IRewarder` contract. Can only be called by the owner.

setRewardPerSecond(uint256).notice: Sets the sushi per second to be distributed. Can only be called by the owner.

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.

userInfo(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.
